commit.message:
Rollup merge of #82841 - hvdijk:x32, r=joshtriplett

Change x64 size checks to not apply to x32.

Rust contains various size checks conditional on target_arch = "x86_64", but these checks were never intended to apply to x86_64-unknown-linux-gnux32. Add target_pointer_width = "64" to the conditions.

verification.payload:
tree d3d10e415f5ae6add9734e0379dc24fd493d77c0
parent a3154427299d49e9d8ce6e8d740fb8ed6032ad8e
parent 95e096d6237298f523e5566be87684d208f7d128
author Mara Bos <m-ou.se@m-ou.se> 1615280724 +0000
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1615280724 +0000

Rollup merge of #82841 - hvdijk:x32, r=joshtriplett

Change x64 size checks to not apply to x32.

Rust contains various size checks conditional on target_arch = "x86_64", but these checks were never intended to apply to x86_64-unknown-linux-gnux32. Add target_pointer_width = "64" to the conditions.

files.patch:
@@ -27,7 +27,7 @@
 
 #[macro_use]
 extern crate rustc_macros;
-#[cfg(target_arch = "x86_64")]
+#[cfg(all(target_arch = "x86_64", target_pointer_width = "64"))]
 #[macro_use]
 extern crate rustc_data_structures;
 #[macro_use]

@@ -23,7 +23,7 @@
 
 #[macro_use]
 extern crate rustc_macros;
-#[cfg(target_arch = "x86_64")]
+#[cfg(all(target_arch = "x86_64", target_pointer_width = "64"))]
 #[macro_use]
 extern crate rustc_data_structures;
 #[macro_use]
